item.title: Unbelievable Trick: Access Files on Android Phone with Broken Screen - You Won't Believe What Happens Next!
item.description: Unbelievable Trick: Access Files on Android Phone with Broken Screen It is a nightmare for all of us when our Android phones suddenly break and the touchscreen stops working. In these cases, it is difficult to access the files stored on the device. However, there is an unbelievable trick to access the files on an Android phone with a broken screen. Introduction A broken screen is defined as a display on a device that is cracked or shattered, making it difficult to interact with the device.
